entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to periods of freezing rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and overnight. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
